resources.string: Unfortunately your device does not support NFC. Please click the button to fill out the form.
Enable the NFC setting and please try it again
Unfortunately you are not online. Please check your connection.
Please check your connection so that the identify-agent can reach out you.
Are you sure you want to cancel?
Oops, seems we got a server error
Your connection ist bad. Please try it again.
Press connect to log into the system.
Seems there are no data and network
Please read the NFC card again.
To make a video call with the identify-agent,please allow access to the camera and microphone.
Please hold your Phone up to your ID card to read the NFC
NFC card is reading. Please do not move the card.
NFC data could not be read. Please try it again.
NFC data read successfully. You are being redirected to the vitality check.
Please wait on this screen for our customer representative to call you.
Make sure you have your ID with you and ready.
Please answer to start the video call.
You must have your face in the picture.
For identification, please sign your signature in the specified area.
Our identify-agent is there for you right away.
Please check your connection and click the button to connect with our identify-agent
Sms code is missing. Please check it.
You are in the vitality check phase. The vitality check will be done in a few steps. You can continue with a smile on the first step.
Are you sure you want to cancel?
You have reached the maximum number of nfc read errors. Continue with the customer representative.
You can continue with powerful smile.
you can blink to connect customer services
You must blink to detect vitality...
Turn your head to the right at 45 degrees to detect vitality.
Finally, turn your head to the left at 45 degrees to detect vitality.
You have completed the authentication, thank you...
The steps we will take in the identification process are respectively
Scan the specified part of your ID or Passport.
Put your ID or passport on your phone\'s nfc reader.
Please confirm camera and microphone permissions to continue.
Take photos of the front and back of your ID.
Keep the back of your ID in the frame so that your identification information can be read.
Hold the part of your passport shown in the picture to the frame so that your identity information can be read.
Put your passport on the nfc reader on your device so that your identity data can be read.
Put your ID on the nfc reader in your phone so that your identity data can be read.
Please select the method for identity.
Click to skip the preliminary stages and connect to the customer representative.

Our customer representative will call you as soon as possible and perform the identity verification process. During this time, make sure you are alone in the room, with your ID with you and ready, without closing this screen.
You have completed the vitality check, Thank you...
Please take a photo of the front of your ID card and confirm it.
Please take a photo of the back of your ID card and confirm it.
For identification, please bring your face inside the frame to shoot 5 seconds of video and confirm.
For identification, please bring your face inside the frame to take a photo and confirm.
Press and hold the microphone, say the word in the picture
For determination of vitality, please say the word you see in the picture by holding down the button.
You cannot complete this step because there is no nfc reading device on your device. You can continue the authentication by clicking the button.
